TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AssociatedMetadataProvider extends System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadataProvider
Public MustInherit Class AssociatedMetadataProvider Inherits ModelMetadataProvider

summary.span: 提供用于实现元数据提供程序的抽象类。

span.span: Provides an abstract class to implement a metadata provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元数据提供程序模型提供元数据。A metadata provider provides metadata for a model. 元数据提供程序必须派生自。Metadata providers must derive from . 如果你想要使用自定义验证程序或使用基于属性的元数据的第三方验证程序，你可以继承此类。You can inherit from this class if you want to use a custom validator or a third-party validator that uses attribute-based metadata. 此类实现的抽象方法类并包含其他抽象方法。This class implements the abstract methods of the class and contains additional abstract methods. 当您实现此类时，使用类，以实现验证程序。When you implement this class, use the class to implement the validator. 松散耦合模型提供程序类和验证程序提供程序类。Model provider classes and validator provider classes are loosely coupled. 因此，它们独立工作，并且每个其他没有任何依赖关系。Therefore, they work independently and have no dependencies on each other. 但是，元数据提供程序公开元数据可以访问和使用验证提供程序。However, the metadata provider exposes metadata that can be accessed and used by validation providers. 例如，默认元数据提供程序 (类) 读取对象的显示名称。For example, the default metadata provider (the class) reads the display name of an object. 此显示名称使用通过验证提供程序创建了验证错误消息时。This display name is used by the validation provider when it creates a validation error message.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，初始化派生自 的类的新实例。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates metadata for a model.

summary.span: 启动派生类筛选特性列表。

span.span: Enables derived classes to filter the list of attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的代码基类返回的所有属性。The code in the base class returns all attributes. 此方法可让筛选属性的派生的类。This method lets derived classes filter the attributes.
